name: 1H FX Breakout Volume Strategy
description: Price-action breakout system for major FX pairs on 1-hour bars. Goes long on 10-bar high breaks with 15% volume surge, short on 10-bar low breaks with same volume filter; ignores low-volatility days via daily ATR screen. Exits via 5-EMA cross or 2% stop. Risks 1.5% equity per trade.
